title: Burp Suit https抓包配置
content:
官网说的很清楚了 
  
 1. [删除已安装的burp suit证书PortSwigger CA](https://support.portswigger.net/customer/portal/articles/1783098-Installing_Remove%20CA%20Certificate%20-%20Safari.html) 
  
 2. [Installing Burp's CA Certificate in Safari，打开https网站时chrome不会弹提示安装证书。得用Safari打开https网站，才会弹安装证书的提示。](https://support.portswigger.net/customer/portal/articles/1783096-Installing_Installing%20CA%20Certificate%20-%20Safari.html) 
  
  
 3. [Installing Burp's CA Certificate in an Android Device](https://support.portswigger.net/customer/portal/articles/1841102-Mobile%20Set-up_Android%20Device%20-%20Installing%20CA%20Certificate.html) 
  
  
 4. [Installing Burp's CA Certificate in an iOS Device](https://support.portswigger.net/customer/portal/articles/1841109-Mobile%20Set-up_iOS%20Device%20-%20Installing%20CA%20Certificate.html) 
  
  
  
 [总的导航目录](https://support.portswigger.net/customer/portal/articles/1783075-Installing_Installing%20CA%20Certificate.html)
